name: Elementime Temple
description:
What if Disc Room happened in a temple full of elemental discs?

Fire beats Water that beats Plant mixed together with discs, tiles and orbs interacting with these rules.

Activate elemental tiles and take orbs to increase the timer!

Credits:
Thomas Gonzalez - Technical Game Designer
Thibaud Bousquet - 2D/3D Artist

Made during the Disc Room Jam : https://itch.io/jam/disc-room-game-jam
